name: Island Cleaner
description:
Island Cleaner is a 2D adventure game developed in Unity3D for Windows by the 2Weeks team consisted of 3 friends (besties). This game was created for the "Eco Jam 2022".

The theme of the jam is the environment with "pollution" being the keyword.

Sail with your boat and cleanse the islands from pollution.

Controls: 

WASD -> Move

E -> Action Key

Alt + F4 -> Force Quit

We're approaching Easter... Chickens lay Eggs Did you know that lizardmen can sing?
